description: Yeehaa is a seasoned tech manager and consultant with a strong background in software engineering and project management. With experience across industries and an education from top-tier institutions, Yeehaa combines academic insights with practical expertise to drive innovation and efficiency. Their work includes thought-provoking blog posts on topics like ecosystem architecture, internet fragmentation, and sustainable innovation. Yeehaa also curated a course on "Grooming Your Ecosystem," emphasizing leadership, adaptability, and creativity. Their diverse skill set and forward-thinking approach make them a valuable asset in navigating complex technological landscapes and fostering resilient, interconnected systems.
blurb: Yeehaa: A tech manager and consultant driving innovation across industries. Expertise in software engineering, project management, and ecosystem architecture. Advocates for sustainable, resilient systems and adaptive leadership.
